parts.japanese: テム：ナスカの上空には不思議な庭園がうかんでいた…
parts.thammy: Tim: A mysterious garden was floating in the skies above Nazca...
parts.claude: Tim: A mysterious garden floated in the sky above Nazca...

parts.japanese: 地上ではニールたちが右往左往しているのが米つぶのように見える。
parts.thammy: Neil and the others on the ground looked like grains of rice as they ran about every which way.
parts.claude: On the ground, Neil and the others looked like grains of rice as they ran around frantically.

parts.japanese: ナスカの地上絵はこの空中庭園のための飛行場だったのだろうか？
parts.thammy: Could the Nazca lines possibly have been an airfield for this midair garden?
parts.claude: Could the Nazca lines have been an airfield for this floating garden...?

parts.japanese: 月の種族：また会ったわね。クッククク。こんなところまでうろうろと元気なぼうやだこと。
parts.thammy: Race of the Moon: We meet again, huh? Mweheheheh. If you're hanging around a place like this, you must be a vigorous little boy.
parts.claude: Race of the Moon: We meet again. Mweheheh. What a lively little boy, wandering around even in a place like this.

parts.japanese: 月の種族：この空中庭園はあたしたちののりもの。
parts.thammy: Race of the Moon: This mid-air garden is our vehicle.
parts.claude: Race of the Moon: This floating garden is our vessel.

parts.japanese: ４つの地域に安置される４つのクリスタルボール。時計まわりにめぐって手に入れることね。クッククク…
parts.thammy: Four crystal balls are enshrined in the four areas. Go around clockwise and you can get them all. Mweheheheh...
parts.claude: Four crystal balls are enshrined in four regions. Travel clockwise to collect them all. Mweheheh...

parts.japanese: 月の種族：空中庭園の裏と表。ガケからとびおりればそこはもうさかさまの世界…
parts.thammy: Race of the Moon: The midair garden's underside and its surface. If you jump down from a cliff, there's still an inverted world is there...
parts.claude: Race of the Moon: The floating garden has both a top and a bottom. Jump from a cliff, and you'll find an inverted world below...

parts.japanese: このタイルをふむと何か音がするようだ…
parts.thammy: When you step on this tile, something makes a sound...
parts.claude: Stepping on this tile seems to make a sound...

parts.japanese: きょだいな鳥をたおすとしかばねからミステリードールが見つかった！！
parts.thammy: After defeating the huge bird, you found a Mystery Doll in its corpse!!
parts.claude: After defeating the giant bird, a Mystery Doll was found in its remains!!

parts.japanese: プロペラ音とともに拡声器からニールのさけび声がひびく！
parts.thammy: Through the sound of a propeller, Neil's voice echoes from a megaphone!
parts.claude: Along with the sound of a propeller, Neil's shout echoes from a megaphone!

parts.japanese: ニール：テムーっ！地上が近いぞーっ！！！！！
parts.thammy: Neil: Tiiim...! You're getting too close to the grouuund...!!
parts.claude: Neil: Tiiim! The ground is getting close!!

parts.japanese: エアプレインで受けとめるからそこから飛びおりるんだっ！！
parts.thammy: I'll catch you in my aeroplane, so jump down...!!
parts.claude: I'll catch you with the aeroplane, so jump from there!!

parts.japanese: ニール：しまったあっ！このぼくがミスするとはっ！！
parts.thammy: Neil: Draaat...! I… I missed...!!
parts.claude: Neil: Damn! Even I made a mistake!!

parts.japanese: カレン：ニールのばかばかばかばかっ！テムが死んじゃうっ！！！
parts.thammy: Karen: Neil you dumb dumb dumb dummy...! Tim's going to die...!!
parts.claude: Karen: Neil, you idiot, idiot, idiot, idiot! Tim's going to die!!

parts.japanese: ロブ：ニール！まだ地上までもう少しあるっ！もう一回だっ！！
parts.thammy: Rob: Neil! There's still a little more time before he hits the ground..! Do it one more time...!!
parts.claude: Rob: Neil! There's still a bit more before he hits the ground! One more time!!

parts.japanese: ニール：よおし！今度こそは見てろっ！！！
parts.thammy: Neil: Alright! This time for sure, you'll see...!!
parts.claude: Neil: Alright! This time, watch me!!

parts.japanese: ニール：しかしあぶないところだった…
parts.thammy: Neil: That was dangerous...
parts.claude: Neil: That was a close one, though...

parts.japanese: カレン：くすんくすん…
parts.thammy: Karen *Sniffle* *Sniffle*...
parts.claude: Karen: *Sniff* *Sniff*...

parts.japanese: エリック：ヒックヒックぐすっ…
parts.thammy: Eric: *Sob* *Sob* *Sob*
parts.claude: Eric: *Hic* *Hic* *Sniff*...

parts.japanese: ロブ：カレンもエリックも泣くなよ。テムは助かったんだからさ。
parts.thammy: Rob: Karen and Eric, stop cryin'. We saved Tim, after all.
parts.claude: Rob: Karen, Eric, don't cry. We saved Tim, so it's okay.

parts.japanese: リリィ：しっかしニールってすごいよね。こんなもの作っちゃうんだもん。
parts.thammy: Lillie: By the waaay, Neil's amazing, isn't he? Having made a thing like this.
parts.claude: Lillie: But Neil's really amazing, isn't he? He made something like this!

parts.japanese: ニール：はっは。そんなにほめないでくれよ。
parts.thammy: Neil: Haha. Please don't praise me like that.
parts.claude: Neil: Haha. Don't praise me so much.

parts.japanese: それよりこのまま次のイセキまで送ってあげよう。
parts.thammy: Anyway, I'll take you to the next ruin with this.
parts.claude: More than that, I'll take you to the next ruins.

parts.japanese: 例の白鳥座の形から言うとムー大陸のはずだ。
parts.thammy: If we go by the precedent of the ruins mapping up to the shape of the constellation of Cygnus, the next ruin should be the continent of Mu.
parts.claude: Based on the Cygnus formation, it should be Mu Continent.

parts.japanese: ニール：さあ海へでるぞっ！！
parts.thammy: Neil: Alright, out to the ocean...!!
parts.claude: Neil: Alright, let's head out to sea!!

parts.japanese: この大海原のどこかにムー大陸がねむっているはずだ。
parts.thammy: The continent of Mu should be sleeping somewhere in this deep blue sea.
parts.claude: Mu Continent should be sleeping somewhere in this great ocean.

parts.japanese: テム：ぼくらはききいっぱつでエアプレインからにげだした…
parts.thammy: Tim: We barely ejected from the aeroplane...
parts.claude: Tim: We narrowly escaped from the aeroplane...

parts.japanese: ニールはすごい発明家だが彼の作品にはいつもどこかしらぬけているところがある…
parts.thammy: Neil is an amazing inventor but his products are always missing something...
parts.claude: Neil is an incredible inventor, but his creations always seem to be missing something...

parts.japanese: かんぺきな人間なんてどこにもいないのかもしれないとぼくは思った。
parts.thammy: It occurred to me that a prefect person may not exist anywhere.
parts.claude: I thought that perhaps perfect people don't exist anywhere.
